name: Treatment Center Investment and Valuation Retreat West 2023
content: Whether you are looking to grow your current business and have no plans for M and A activity, or if you are looking to pursue mergers and acquisitions, join us at TCIV West; the ideal event for executives and financial professionals interested in all types of growth strategies. Gain the connections, knowledge, and resources you need to succeed. With an agenda tailored to the growth and future of your business, this premier event is perfect for executives and financial professionals looking to grow, invest in, and transform their treatment center operations. Come learn from and network with the industry's best in Scottsdale! URLs: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/1803633-0?pid=4868 LinkedIn: https://go.evvnt.com/1803633-3?pid=4868 Facebook: https://go.evvnt.com/1803633-4?pid=4868 YouTube: https://go.evvnt.com/1803633-5?pid=4868 Instagram: https://go.evvnt.com/1803633-6?pid=4868 Time: 8:00 am - 11:30 am Venue details: Fairmont Scottsdale Princess, 7575 East Princess Drive, Scottsdale, Arizona, 85255, United States Prices: Healthcare/Treatment Center Provider - Super Saver - Through August 4: USD 1399.00, Financial/Legal Professional - Super Saver - Through August 4: USD 1699.00, Healthcare/Treatment Center Provider - Early Bird - Through September 29: USD 1499.00, Financial/Legal Professional - Early Bird - Through September 29: USD 1799.00, Healthcare/Treatment Center Provider - Standard - Through November 26: USD 1599.00, Financial/Legal Professional - Standard - Through November 26: USD 1899.00, Healthcare/Treatment Center Provider - Onsite - Begins November 27: USD 1699.00, Financial/Legal Professional - Standard - Onsite - Begins November 27: USD 1999.00, Non-Sponsor Vendor Pass - Through November 29: USD 5500.00 Speakers: Dexter BraffMBA, MS, Derek Price, Chad Smith, David Sheridan, Harry Nelson Esq., Jen Carvalho MBA, Sherry Daley MIM, Nick Howell BS, Andrew Sossin, Christopher Wolfington, David Long MHA, Jeri Davis MBA, Dan Gemp, Payton Nyquvest, Jeremy Bloom
